content: #6173 (introducing the simplex category) is currently marked help-wanted because I don't know how to resolve some non-terminal simps.
There are two cases where I use simp with push_cast, but neither simp? with push_cast or squeeze_simp with push_cast returns the correct set of lemmas.
Is this a case where the simplify trace helps?
I just managed to massage some of these into suffices, simpa. But it remains very ugly.
And the proofs don't have any content at all. It's just a bunch of case splits, and then some rather trivial inequalities.
I really which thy hypertidy could do this in one line for us
